heading: HB01619
0: AN ACT CREATING THREE (3) ADDITIONAL REGIONAL TRIAL COURT BRANCHES IN THE FOURTH JUDICIAL REGION TO BE STATIONED AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF CATANAUAN, PROVINCE OF QUEZON, FURTHER AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 14 (E) OF THE BATAS PAMBANSA BILANG 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS 'THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980', AS AMENDED AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
